Unfortunately, in our day and age, it is very easy and not time-consuming for somebody to download your photo and pose it as their own. Image theft happens on social media more often than you think. Moreover, there have been a few cases of well-known brands stealing a small creator’s photo or painting from their account and using it as a print on their clothes. This way, the artists got neither money nor credit for their work. Watermarks can help to prevent your images from being stolen. Place your name or logo on them to claim your copyright. 


Promote your works

Watermarks can be great not only for protecting your photos but also for getting your name out there. Internet is a peculiar thing; you never know where your images might end up. Even if you post your works on your Instagram account, there is a chance that your potential client might see them in a community on another social media platform with no link to your profile. By adding your logo, website address, or contact information to your images, you will give people who like your art and want to hire you the opportunity to find you easily and quickly.

- Real sketching experience: draw with finger, stylus pen (not digital), and Apple Pencil
- Copy and modify makeup projects while keeping the original
- No quality loss when zooming in and out
- Works offline
- Quick sharing options
- iCloud sync across all your devices
- Support for Split View on iPad

BRUSHES AND TOOLS
- Realistic cosmetic textures including matte, gloss, metallic, creamy, highlighter, and glitter
- Brushes respond to light movement and face shapes
- Mirror tool: create on one side of face and mirror it
- Smooth and precise brush strokes
- Makeup Kits: themed collections of beauty products

SUBSCRIPTION PRICING AND TERMS
 - Prêt-à-Makeup is a subscription app. Download it for free and try out selected features. Get unlimited access by subscribing to one of the two auto-renewing subscription options: yearly and monthly (10-day free trial available).
- These prices are for United States customers. Pricing in other countries may vary and actual charges may be converted to your local currency depending on the country of residence. 
- Your Prêt-à-Makeup subscription will automatically renew at the end of each term and your credit card will be charged through your iTunes account. You can turn off auto-renew at any time from your iTunes account settings but refunds will not be provided for any unused portion of the term. 
- Subscription automatically renews unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24-hours before the end of the current period. Account will be charged for renewal within 24-hours prior to the end of the current period, and identify the cost of the renewal.
- Subscriptions may be managed by the user and auto-renewal may be turned off by going to the user's Account Settings after purchase. Go to your device Settings > [your nome] > iTunes & App Store > View Apple ID > Enter you password when prompted > Subscription > Prêt-à-Makeup > Cancel or change subscription plan. Learn more: http://support.apple.com/kb/ht4098
- Any unused portion of a free trial period, if offered, will be forfeited when the user purchases a subscription to that publication, where applicable.

Fancy Fonts - its fonts for Instagram as well as fonts for TikTok. You can find a lot of fonts supporting English language and many others. You can selects fonts you like and modify them they way you wish!

Inside Fancy Fonts you will find:

• Fancy fonts

Using our Editor you can modify:

• Text alignment (left, center and right side, also appliable to only selected piece of text)

Also in the Editor you will find a lot of tasty backgrounds for you Stories:
• Static colors (packs: System, Pastel Rainbow, Beach, Aesthetic, Capucino, Green parrot, Summer is coming)
• Soft gradients (packs: Yellow, Blue, Reddish-Pinky, Purple, Green)

When you copy text to Insert to Instagram, as well when you create a Story or Download text as a sticker to your Photo Library, this text is being added to History (the 3rd tab). There is also an instruction inside the app which demonstrates the steps you need to perform to add the text from app to Instagram Stories and TikTok Video.

By default you have 18 actions for free: copying, making a story and downloading text as a sticker treats as an action.
